where you try to import a third party
SSL or TLS certificate insulation

certificate into ECM you must verify

the certificate chain are in Pam encoded
formats
if the sets get bundle provided by the

also as shown on screen ECM supports the

key sizes

following commands
you have reached the maximum number of

request an increase
the total number of certificates that
you can import into ACM as a default
value of 2500 and the number of
certificates you can Import in a given
year is twice the number of imported
certificates which includes certificates
that you imported and deleted in the
last
365 days
If you experience this error message and
you have not exceeded 2500 certificates
for your accounts then you might have
exited the limits for certificates that
you can Import in a year you can request
an increase from the service quota
console
from the AWS Management console navigate
to the service quotas console
in the left navigation pane select AWS
services and search for the AWS
certificates manager service
jws default quota value shows the
client's maximum number of imported
certificates that you can have within
your accounts the number of imported
certificates that you can have over the
past 365 days is twice the number of
imported certificates now if you want to
request an increase for imported
certificates select import access skates
and then select the request quotas
next enter the new value and submits
after submitting the request you will
see that the quota increase is
successfully requested
this Escape field contains more than one
certificates you can only specify one
certificate in this field unable to
validate certificate chain the chain
most starts with the immediate sign-in
set skates followed by any
intermediaries in that order the index
within this chain of the invalid
certificate is zero could not validate
the certificates with the certificate
chain if you encounter these errors then
you either uploaded the certificates
chain instead of the certificates in the
set scale body section or the set
scripts chain contains more than just
the intermediate certificates and reward
certificates
you must be sure that the certificates
included in the certificate chain are in
the right order from the intermediate
certificates generated by the
certificate Authority
so this certificates authorities good
certificates to maintain the certificate
chain of trust
otherwise the SSL certificates will not
be trusted by some applications browsers
and more
when importing a certificates using the

contents of your certificate files to

prefix are shown on screen otherwise you

supported this certificate is not valid

if a CM can't snap the certificate to

command
provided certificates is not a valid

or certification

certificates and its private key for
self-signed certificates you must
provide the certificates chain if the
certificate is signed by certificate
Authority or CE
so review this scenario where you
experience this issue I will be
uploading a certificate signed by C
along with its corresponding private key
to resolve this error messages you must
paste the contents of these files in the
required text box using the SM console
navigate to the ASM console
choose import a certificate
copy the contents of these certificates
certificates chain and private key
you can add a tag key

Now by using the CLI you can import the
